sections.title: References

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section should maintain a neutral point of view by only listing references without promoting them.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The references are listed systematically without any promotional language.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The section is objective and follows a neutral listing of references.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No overlaps with other sections as references are listed separately.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The references contribute to verifiability by providing sources for claims in the article.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: All references are provided with DOI links for easy verification.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Complete adherence as each reference is correctly linked to its respective DOI.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: References provide independent verification of the content.

sections.meta_notes: The References section is well-structured and adheres to guidelines by ensuring neutrality and verifiability.
